quotes.quote: Leverage is the ability to apply positive pressure on yourself to follow through on your decisions even when it hurts.
Rich people use debt to leverage investments and grow cash flows. Poor people use debt to buy things that make rich people richer.
The greatest leverage you can create for yourself is the pain that comes from inside, not outside. Knowing that you have failed to live up to your own standards for your life is the ultimate pain.
Life is based on leverage. The more you know how to leverage life, the more successful you will become.

People with leverage have dominance over people with less leverage. In other words, just as humans gained advantages over animals by creating leveraged tools, similarly, humans who use these tools of leverage have more power over humans that do not. Saying it more simply, 'leverage is power'.
Successful people don’t use the obstacles of time, education, and money as excuses...they use them as leverage to get help.
Fair play doesn't pertain in bargaining. What matters there is leverage.
You never get what you deserve; only what you have the leverage to negotiate.
Relationships are leverage. If you give value to someone else first, you have leverage.
Financial leverage is the advantage the rich have over the poor and middle class.
Celebrate what God has given others. Leverage what God has given you.
When you combine ignorance and leverage, you get some pretty interesting results.
One who sees the weakness of his strength can also leverage the strength of his weakness, readily, to his advantage.
It is far more lucrative and fun to leverage your strengths instead of attempting to fix all the chinks in your armor.
The leverage and influence social media gives citizens are rapidly spreading into the business world.
Leverage is the reason some people become rich and others do not become rich
Leverage is everything-don't begin to pry until you've got the long arm on your side.
